synopsis.text: Seeing her high school sweetheart, Yoshihiko, off to college, Kana finally musters the courage to confess her love, only to find herself in a long-distance relationship. As she grapples with her studies and the absence of her beloved, a new chapter unfolds with the arrival of Shogo, a young and charismatic teacher. Shogo not only becomes her new class instructor but also moves into her home as a relative of her late father. With this unexpected twist, Kana's life takes a turn for the complicated, as she finds herself torn between her loyalty to Yoshihiko and her growing fascination for Shogo. Will Kana remain steadfast in her love, or will the allure of a new connection prove too strong to resist?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
